title: LSEG reports in-line first quarter as Microsoft partnership progresses
text: London Stock Exchange Group said on Thursday its first quarter growth was in line with plans for the roll out of products from its partnership with Microsoft , although the bourse's shares briefly hit a five-month low.

title: Microsoft-backed Rubrik prices IPO above range at $32 per share, source says
text: Rubrik , the cybersecurity software startup that counts Microsoft among its investors, priced its initial public offering at $32 per share on Wednesday above its indicated price range, according to a person familiar with the matter.

title: Should You Buy Microsoft Stock Before Earnings
text: Microsoft is benefiting from the rising effectiveness of artificial intelligence.

title: ADDING MULTIMEDIA GlassHive Announces Collaboration with Microsoft to transform MSP Sales and Marketing to capture AI opportunity with customers
text: ALLEN, Texas--(BUSINESS WIRE)--GlassHive and Microsoft collaborate to empower partners in marketing Microsoft Business Solutions, streamlining access, and generating leads.

title: What's in Store for These 5 Technology Stocks in Q1 Earnings?
text: Here we take a sneak peek at five stocks in the Zacks Computer and Technology sector due to report first-quarter 2024 earnings on Apr 25.

title: Microsoft and Amazon face scrutiny from UK competition watchdog over recent AI deals
text: British competition regulators said Wednesday they'll scrutinize recent artificial intelligence deals by Microsoft and Amazon over concerns that the moves could thwart competition in the AI industry.

title: What's in Store for Microsoft ETFs This Earnings Season?
text: Microsoft (MSFT) has been caught in a spree of heavy technology sector sell-off in recent weeks, erasing most of its gains made this year. There might be gains in store if MSFT comes up with an earnings beat as demand for generative AI will continue to fuel cloud business.

title: Microsoft claims that small, localized language models can be powerful as well
text: Microsoft has announced the development of a small, locally run family of AI language models called Phi-3 mini. In their Technical Report posted on the arXiv preprint server, the team behind the new SLM describes it as more capable than others of its size and more cost effective than larger models.

title: UK competition watchdog steps up scrutiny of big tech's role in AI startups
text: Microsoft and Amazon asked to comment on tie-ups, a move that paves way for formal investigation

title: Protect Our Earth With 5 ETF & Stock Investing Strategies (Revised)
text: Rising global warming and its adverse impact on Earth makes it important for investors to be socially responsive while creating their investment portfolio. While these stocks and ETFs should gain, rising natural disasters should also boost businesses of disaster recovery stocks.

title: Cisco Systems joins Microsoft, IBM in Vatican pledge to ensure ethical use and development of AI
text: Tech giant Cisco Systems on Wednesday joined Microsoft and IBM in signing onto a Vatican-sponsored pledge to ensure artificial intelligence is developed and used ethically and to benefit the common good.

title: UK probes Amazon and Microsoft over AI partnerships with Mistral, Anthropic, and Inflection
text: The U.K.'s Competition and Markets Authority (CMA) is launching preliminary enquiries into whether the close-knit tie-ups and hiring practices involving Microsoft, Amazon and a trio of AI startup falls within the scope of its merger rules â€” and whether the arrangements could impact competition in the U.K. market.

title: Microsoft's AI lead puts Amazon cloud dominance on watch
text: Upcoming quarterly reports from U.S. tech giants may show Microsoft is closing the gap on cloud-computing market leader Amazon.com as more businesses switch to its services, attracted by a clutch of generative AI features that are powered by OpenAI's technology.

title: Microsoft, Amazon AI partnerships face scrutiny from British regulators
text: British antitrust regulators are seeking views on partnerships between Microsoft and Amazon with smaller generative AI model makers.

title: Doubling Down On Telus In Smith Maneuver - March 2024 Dividend Income Report

title: UK watchdog seeks views on Microsoft's and Amazon's AI partnerships
text: Britain's competition watchdog said on Wednesday it was seeking comments on the AI partnerships between Microsoft and Mistral AI, as well as between Amazon and Anthropic.

title: Invest Like a Billionaire: Consider These 4 Tech Stocks
text: Billionaires are investing heavily in technology, an area that has led gains in the S&P 500 in recent months. A few stocks in particular show up over and over in 16 hedge funds analyzed by The Motley Fool.

title: Microsoft Just Expanded Its Partnership with a Critical Ally in the Artificial Intelligence (AI) Revolution
text: Microsoft and Cognizant just announced a wide-ranging strategic partnership. The pair will combine their artificial intelligence (AI) and digital transformation expertise to accelerate the adoption of generative AI.

title: Meet the 3 "Magnificent Seven" Stocks Members of Congress Can't Stop Selling
text: The long-term outperformance of the Magnificent Seven stocks have often made them irresistible to investors -- including members of Congress. However, lawmakers were active sellers of three Magnificent Seven components in 2023.

title: This AI Stock Trades at a Dirt-Cheap Valuation, and Its Chatbot Just Hit 200 Million Users
text: Many artificial intelligence stocks are trading at high multiples, even with the market's recent pullback. Chinese-based Baidu could offer investors a cheaper alternative.
